description: Number of different energy states of n positive and n negative charges on a necklace. Different sets of distances between n points chosen from 2n equally spaced points on a circle.
links: Index entries for sequences related to necklaces
mathematica: n=4; perm=Permutations[ Table[ -1, {n-1} ]~Join~Table[ 1, {n} ] ]; res=Table[ (Prepend[ #, -1 ].RotateRight[ Prepend[ #, -1 ], k ])/2, {k, 1, n} ]&/@perm; kort=Length[ Length/@Split[ Sort[ res ] ] ]
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
